refnamediv.refpurpose: Freeze the amplitude and frequency time functions of a pv stream according to a control-rate trigger.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This opcodes 'freezes' the evolution of pvs stream by locking into steady amplitude and/or frequency values for each bin. The freezing is controlled, independently for amplitudes and frequencies, by a control-rate trigger, which switches the freezing 'on' if equal to or above 1 and 'off' if below 1.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kfreeza -- freezing switch for amplitudes. Freezing is on if above or equal to 1 and off if below 1.
kfcf -- freezing switch for frequencies. Freezing is on if above or equal to 1 and off if below 1.

warning.para: It is unsafe to use the same f-variable for both input and output of pvs opcodes. Using the same one might lead to undefined behavior on some opcodes. Use a different one on the left and right sides of the opcode.

refsect1.title: Examples

example.title: Example
example.programlisting: asig in ; input ktrig oscil 1.5, 0.25, 1 ; trigger fim pvsanal asig1, 1024, 256, 1024, 0 ; pvoc analysis fou pvsfreeze fim, abs(ktrig), abs(ktrig) ; regular 'freeze' of spectra aout pvsynth fou ; pvoc synthesis

refsect1.para: In the example above the input signal will be regularly 'frozen' for a short while, as the trigger rises above 1 about every two seconds.
